channel.title: Comments on: Fourth of July on a mountain

item.title: By: Marcus Rosentrater
item.dc:creator: Marcus Rosentrater
item.description: I'm very impressed with your hiking inabilities.
item.content:encoded: I’m very impressed with your hiking inabilities.

item.title: By: amy bugg burke
item.dc:creator: amy bugg burke
item.description: When I was a little girl, my Grandaddy Bugg would tell us bedtime stories (usually after a hearty dinner of sauteed chicken bites, otherwise known as "Chicken McBuggets"). One of our favorites was about the time he was camping in the jungle and some mischievous little monkeys stole all of his things. Not a word of it was true, but I always loved picturing that little gang of monkeys up in the trees, wearing his watch and shiny belt buckle. Color me jealous Will Sanders. =)
item.content:encoded: When I was a little girl, my Grandaddy Bugg would tell us bedtime stories (usually after a hearty dinner of sauteed chicken bites, otherwise known as “Chicken McBuggets”). One of our favorites was about the time he was camping in the jungle and some mischievous little monkeys stole all of his things. Not a word of it was true, but I always loved picturing that little gang of monkeys up in the trees, wearing his watch and shiny belt buckle. Color me jealous Will Sanders. =)

item.title: By: Doug Brown
item.dc:creator: Doug Brown
item.description: Good story. Of course, yr tracking that the best thing about going up a mountain is that you can always say, in the after years, yeh, I did that. That's the construct I've built my life around anyhow.
item.content:encoded: Good story. Of course, yr tracking that the best thing about going up a mountain is that you can always say, in the after years, yeh, I did that. That’s the construct I’ve built my life around anyhow.

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: I am sculpting a giant statue of Marcus out of sulpher. it will smell a lot like marcus does in real life actually. If you have sent a comment please be patient, it takes a while to get pan the rivers of spam for gold, I have a few hundred to sit down and delete now. But keep reading and commenting, thanks everyone.
item.content:encoded:
I am sculpting a giant statue of Marcus out of sulpher. it will smell a lot like marcus does in real life actually.
If you have sent a comment please be patient, it takes a while to get pan the rivers of spam for gold, I have a few hundred to sit down and delete now.
But keep reading and commenting, thanks everyone.

item.description: did you mail Marcus a sulphur souvenier?
